resources.string:
No data from user input will be sent to the developer.

When using the feedback functionality within the app, the feedback will be stored together with your mail-information.
The feedback is only available for the author and the developer. Other users or any third parties cannot see the feedback.

Since the app is distributed via GooglePlay Store, some data (e.g. information on app usage, devices running the app or crashes) is collected according to the Google Privacy Notice
The latest Privacy Notice from Google can be found at https://policies.google.com/privacy
